SEARCH
Package management

Class StaffDataManager

java.lang.Object
management.StaffDataManager
All Implemented Interfaces:
DataManager<Staff,String>
public class StaffDataManager extends Object implements DataManager<Staff,String>
A DataManager for Staffs that implements interface DataManager Collect data from CSV file with BufferedReader and write back to CSV file with BufferedWriter for the data collected for the Staff ID in String Holds all the data type Staff

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    StaffDataManager()
    Constructs an StaffDataManager filePath for the directory of the CSV retrieveAll() to retrieve all the data from CSV and instantiate each of the data to type Staff when app begin and finally, add each data to staffs
